s2r2.geometry
Class VectorMath

java.lang.Object
  s2r2.geometry.VectorMath

public class VectorMath
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements general vector-math operations. In contrast to similar methods in the classes Vector and Point the contained methods always return new objects

Author:
Fabian Prasser
